function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Varying measurement units and missing standard deviations may lead to inaccurate data analysis and conclusions.","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and conclusions may result in ineffective interventions and resource misuse.","Mitigation":"Standardize measurement units and collect standard deviations for accurate data analysis.","Technologies":"Data standardization tools to convert variables to common units.","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and decision makers.","Owner":"Research organizations, data analysis teams."},{"Description":"Limited evidence for the effectiveness of barrier devices like N95 masks over simple surgical masks.","Impact":"Uncertainty in choosing the most effective barrier devices may lead to inefficiency in containing epidemics.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to gather more evidence on the effectiveness of different barrier devices.","Technologies":"Research and testing facilities for evaluating the effectiveness of barrier devices.","People":"Health organizations, researchers, and policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies."},{"Description":"Confounding additional routines may affect the interpretation of the effectiveness of interventions such as adding virucidals or antiseptics to normal handwashing.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the effectiveness of interventions may lead to inappropriate resource allocation.","Mitigation":"Conduct controlled studies to isolate the effects of specific interventions from confounding factors.","Technologies":"Experimental design and statistical analysis tools for controlled studies.","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, and data analysts.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."}]}
